body:
> meaning once 0.12.0 is released, we can migrate to using it in Guix, and remove our RISC-V workarounds.

That would be nice. Concept ACk.
Is it the time to undraft? -- https://github.com/lief-project/LIEF/releases/tag/0.12.0 :)

> Is it the time to undraft? 

I'll add updated Guix hashes shortly.
